item.description:
Hold onto your hiking boots, we have a big day planned!!

Today we'll explore the views and brews of the Great Bay area.

 

We begin at Wagon Hill Farm on Little Bay and the Oyster River. Now a public park with woods, fields, and great scenic views.

Bald eagles frequent the area in winter!

Then we'll drive around to Great Bay National Wildlife Refuge at Pease. This trail begins at the old Pease Air Base weapons storage area and wends its way back down to Great Bay. There's also a newly built mile-long boardwalk trail to discover.

Once we have our fill of tidal waters, we'll join the Redhook Brewery Polar Grillfest in progress right down the road. They'll have the grills fired up outside attempting to laugh in the face of winter. And there will be live music, cooking demos, heated tents, fire pits and lots o' fun, with a $5 entry donation to Share Our Strength's No Hungry Kid Campaign. Plenty of food, beer, & wine will be available!

Does this sound like a good day???  Yes, I thought so!!!

Have your snowshoes and microspikes available since conditions may vary!

Liability Release

AS A CONDITION OF ATTENDING THIS MEETUP, YOU AGREE TO hold harmless, and indemnify the organizer and his heirs, and all members and participants of the Seacoast Outdoors Meetup group from any and all claims for injury, illness, death, and/or property damage including those caused by negligence, ignorance, inexperience and other reasons. You also agree to assume all mental, physical, financial, and/or other risk associated with this meetup. Kayaking, camping, hiking, bicycling, snow sports, alcohol consumption, and other activities pose inherent risks and dangers. Participation in these activities is voluntary and dependent upon your own personal judgment.
Time and location are subject to change due to weather and other factors.  Always check email & this listing for updates before leaving home.
item.name: Great Bay... and Beer!
